name: Binders [Chapter One]
description:
Binders is a simple, Narrative driven, linear puzzle game. You play as Taika Tui, a controller of the inter-dimensional slime creature "Bob". Your job is to help fix an erosion that has occurred between dimensional planes by helping out other slime creatures like Bob throwing them back into their Plane of existence.

This game is nowhere complete and at the moment it is more of an introduction to the characters and a tutorial. For ease of quickly jumping through sections of dialogue please use the ">" key.

Also, as this is my first game with a focus on dialogue I would love some feedback regarding the authenticity of the characters and how the community thinks this game should develop further.

Chur - Vin
